column4: you can install ubuntu and access any partitions just fine yes
hm this means i need to use wubi installer or the 'real' full one can do as well? (to install ubuntu but save current Window's D: NTFS partrtition, ubuntu can read NTFS?)
yes, ubuntu reads and writes ntfs partitions on a full real install, it won't overwrite anything there
its an easy install process, the hardest part is partitioning, but that is simple when you know how
